communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Springfield's Email Service Records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

The latest invoice the City of Seneca has paid for the provisioning of Exchange/Outlook email services.  If this invoice does not reflect the licensing level of the accounts being paid for, I also request a record of licenses the City is subscribed to. I have reason to believe these records exist because the City of Seneca receives email traffic at springfieldmo-gov.mail.protection.outlook.com.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael

communications.subject: The Kansas Open Records Act Request: Pittsburg Email System Records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Kansas Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The latest invoice the City of Pittsburg has paid for the provisioning of Exchange/Outlook email services.  If this invoice does not reflect the licensing level of the accounts being paid for, I also request a record of licenses the City is subscribed to. I have reason to believe these records exist because the City of Pittsburg sends emails with email headers that appear to reference this service within them.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael
